title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicy\Resource\RepositoryResource\AptRepository
name: AptRepository
description:
Represents a single apt package repository. These will be added to a repo file that will be managed at /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google_osconfig.list.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.OSPolicy.Resource.RepositoryResource.AptRepository

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.archive_type
params.description: Required. Type of archive files in this repository.

params.name: data.components
params.description: Required. List of components for this repository. Must contain at least one item.

params.name: data.gpg_key
params.description: URI of the key file for this repository. The agent maintains a keyring at /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/osconfig_agent_managed.gpg.
